headline: AI agents are the next wave of software and I’m helping builders and businesses create...
highlights: AI enthusiast assisting businesses with innovation through AI agents.
Holds a Confluent Fundamentals Accreditation and other certifications.
Distinguished Scholar Award recipient from Southern New Hampshire University (2020).
Active participant in organizations such as Black in AI and NSBE.
Consumer Reviewer for the Rare Cancer Research Program, DOD (2019-2021).
University of Pennsylvania alum with educational tenure from 2014 to 2019.
Skilled in Python and software development tools and methodologies.
NCAA Division I and II Student-Athlete with multiple Athletic Scholarships.
Active networking activities reflected in a large follower base of over 10,000.
Published author of 'Facing uncertainty and the importance of resilience' on LinkedIn.
